casebody.data:
SOUTHERN COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES, INC., dba Southernlinc Wireless, petitioner,
v.
Derek THOMAS. No. 13-469. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 21, 2014.

Case below, 720 F.3d 1352.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
